title: BRIEF-Clovis Oncology Says SEC Issued 'Wells Notices' To Co & Certain Of Its Officers
text:
April 10, 2018 / 1:37 PM / in 5 minutes BRIEF-Clovis Oncology Says SEC Issued 'Wells Notices' To Co & Certain Of Its Officers Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 10 (Reuters) - Clovis Oncology Inc: 
* CLOVIS ONCOLOGY SAYS ON APRIL 9 SEC ISSUED ‘WELLS NOTICES’ TO CO & CERTAIN OF ITS CURRENT AND FORMER OFFICERS - SEC FILING 
* SEC’S ‘WELLS NOTICES’ ALLEGES VIOLATIONS OF SOME PROVISIONS OF SECURITIES ACT OF 1933 AND SECURITIES EXCHANGE ACT OF 1934 
* ALLEGED VIOLATIONS RELATE TO CO'S REGULATORY UPDATE IN NOV 2015 THAT FDA REQUESTED MORE CLINICAL DATA ON EFFICACY, SAFETY OF ROCILETINIB Source text: ( bit.ly/2IDAEmj ) Further company coverage:
